definition: Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain

"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
Jacques René Chirac (1932-), president of France 1995-2007

sentences.english: But Mrs. Strunk has no intention of interfering with the anarchy of nature.
sentences.chinese: 但斯特倫剋夫人並無意干涉這種無政府的天性。

sentences.english: Enke and his wife lost their 2-year-old daughter to a heart ailment in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 2006年恩剋夫婦2歲的女兒因心臟病去世。

sentences.english: But Rushkoff's ideas are more complex.
sentences.chinese: 但是，洛西剋夫的觀點還要更加複雜。

sentences.english: Guitars and vocals by Zak Claxton.
sentences.chinese: 扎剋剋拉克斯頓的吉他和主唱。

sentences.chinese: 扎剋剋拉克斯頓的吉他和主唱。

sentences.english: We have shipped your order goods by M/S "Good Luck", today.
sentences.chinese: 貴方所訂購的貨物，剋日已由好運船運公司裝運。

sentences.english: University Hospital Maastricht , The Netherlands, was the setting for this retrospective study.
sentences.chinese: 我們在荷蘭的馬斯垂剋大學醫院進行這項回顧性研究。

sentences.english: Certainly quebrada took place in this step on the transport.
sentences.chinese: 肯定剋夫就發生在這步運上。

sentences.english: There will be some impediment about that part of the body represented by that sign which was afflicted at birth.
sentences.chinese: 出生時，被刑剋的星座代表的身體部位也會有些阻礙。

sentences.english: That translates into approximately 3 servings of whole grain per day, or at least 48 grams daily.
sentences.chinese: 轉換成大約3份整粒穀物，或者至少每天48剋日報。

sentences.english: Scylax of Caryanda gives similar account.
sentences.chinese: 塞爾扣剋給予了類似的陳述。

sentences.english: Realizing he might not catch up, Lezak rose to the challenge.
sentences.chinese: 萊扎剋意識到可能追不上了，但是他決定拼了。

sentences.english: Mrs Glick reined in the horse and stopped at the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 格利剋夫人勒住繮繩在十字路口停了下來。

sentences.english: However, upon meeting up with Ben, Luke realized that he had killed the wrong person.
sentences.chinese: 然而，遇到本之後，盧剋意識到自己殺錯了人。

sentences.english: The global convergence of the new genetic algorithm is proved by using Markovian chain theory.
sentences.chinese: 應用馬爾剋夫鏈理論證明了新算法的全局收斂性。

sentences.english: Eggs are sold by the kilogram.
